branchCategory.name: ZSE20C(F)
branchCategory.description: <p>The ZSE20C(F) series is a high-precision digital pressure switch offering compatibility with both compressed air and non corrosive liquids.&nbsp; Compared to the ZSE20, the ZSE20C(F) adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog output, either voltage or current.&nbsp; The ZSE20C(F) also has an IP65 protection rating, compared to the ZSE20's IP40.&nbsp; ZSE20C is vacuum rated, while the ZSE20CF is rated for both vacuum and a low positive pressure range.&nbsp; Each model in the ZSE20 family offers a 3-screen, 3-color display.&nbsp; The main screen shows the curent measured value in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.&nbsp; Delay time for the switch output can be as brief as 1.5 ms, while current consumption is held to 35 mA or less. ZSE20C(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20C(F), High-Precision, Digital Pressure Switch for General Fluids
branchItem.description: <p>The ZSE20C(F) series is a high-precision digital pressure switch offering compatibility with both compressed air and non corrosive liquids.&nbsp; Compared to the ZSE20, the ZSE20C(F) adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog output, either voltage or current.&nbsp; The ZSE20C(F) also has an IP65 protection rating, compared to the ZSE20's IP40.&nbsp; ZSE20C is vacuum rated, while the ZSE20CF is rated for both vacuum and a low positive pressure range.&nbsp; Each model in the ZSE20 family offers a 3-screen, 3-color display.&nbsp; The main screen shows the curent measured value in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.&nbsp; Delay time for the switch output can be as brief as 1.5 ms, while current consumption is held to 35 mA or less. ZSE20C(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant.</p>
